awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 wins & 2 nominations.

fullplot: In an indictment of the British public school system, we follow Mick and his mostly younger friends through a series of indignities and occasionally abuse as any fond feelings toward these schools are destroyed. When Mick and his friends rebel, violently, the catch phrase, "which side would you be on" becomes quite stark.
plot: In this allegorical story, a revolution led by pupil Mick Travis takes place at an old established private school in England.
title: If....

tomatoes.consensus: Incendiary, subversive, and darkly humorous, If.... is a landmark of British countercultural cinema.
